      public static String getNameFromID(int id)

      Returns:

      Returns:
      - The customerID matching the passed Name

      public static int generateCustomerID()
      Returns:
      - A unique CustomerID

    • addCustomer

      public static void addCustomer(DBCustomers C)
      Parameters:
      C - A DBCustomers object containing all attributes to become a customer in the database. - Adds a customer to the database

    • removeCustomer

      public static void removeCustomer(int ID)
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the customer being removed - First deletes all appointments involving the customer, then deletes the customer.

    • modifyCustomer

      public static void modifyCustomer(int ID)
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the customer being modified - Deletes the current customer with this ID and creates a new customer with a matching ID and updated attributes.

    • getFirstOrLast

      public static String getFirstOrLast(String name, int firstOrLast)
      Parameters:
      name - The name to be parsed
      firstOrLast - An integer that chooses which name to return, 1 for first name, 2 for last name
      Returns:
      the first or last name from the full name

    • addressFormatChecker

      public static boolean addressFormatChecker(String address, int countryID)
      Parameters:
      address - - The address to be checked in the form of a string.
      countryID - - Determines what format to check the address against. (U.S. = 1, Canada = 2, U.K. == 3)
      Returns:
      - A true value if the address is formatted correctly, a false value otherwise.
